Implement Phase 3: Task Item HTML/CSS Structure

GOAL:  Create the visual template for task items with all styling for normal, completed, and hover states

- Define task item container styles: background #ffffff, border 1px solid #e0e0e0, border-radius 6px, padding 12px 16px, display flex, align-items center, gap 12px
- Add 8px spacing between task items
- Style checkbox: 20px × 20px, border 2px solid #e0e0e0, border-radius 4px, cursor pointer

- Style task text: flex 1, font-size 16px, font-weight 400, color #1a1a1a, word-wrap for long text
- Style completed task text: color #666666, text-decoration line-through, opacity 0.7
- Style delete button: background transparent, color #666666, border none, padding 8px, border-radius 4px, cursor pointer
- Style delete button hover: background #fee2e2, color #dc2626
- Ensure minimum touch target of 44px for checkbox and delete button
